Class Match

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.sports.Match
All Implemented Interfaces:
Identifiable<String>, Temporal
public class Match extends Object implements Identifiable<String>, Temporal
Represents a sports match/game.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Silvere Martin-Michiellot, Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)
